Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Stephen:

Text.Language: <ere Ctevanoc: pisorp m~marturoc: ,ere piar,/dia~kwn: ouoh etc~marwout.
Hail to Stephen: the first martyr: hail to the archdeacon: and the blessed one.
